name: Moonforged Duelist
description: Moonforged Duelists synchronize their Ostrumite cores to lunar rhythms, striking with terrifying precision and chaining critical moments into decisive victories.

3.name: Lunar Calibration
3.description: You adopt a lunar stance that grants different combat benefits. You may switch stances as a bonus action.

3.name: Precision Strike
3.description: Once per turn when you hit, you may spend 1 Ostrumite Charge to add damage or turn a 19 into a critical hit.

7.name: Reactive Duelist
7.description: When a creature misses you or leaves your reach, you may spend 1 charge to make a melee attack. On a critical hit, you may immediately make a firearm attack.

11.name: Exploit Opening
11.description: Your weapon attacks ignore resistance on critical hits, and your critical hit range expands.

15.name: Perfect Timing
15.description: Once per turn when you miss, you may reroll the attack. Critical hits grant movement and restore charges.

18.name: Lunar Execution
18.description: Once per short rest, you may declare an attack an automatic critical hit against a wounded or pressured target.
